TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Valana, title = Valana, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Valana} }

S.FORM: == Valana == u sulit nu Hulam 法蘭娜部落 u siwkay nu niyazu' i Nantou a kuwan ku niyazu' nu Valana. u kasalumaluma' nu Valana sa, 38 ku luma'. kumud nu kasabinawlan sa, 129 ku tademawan. kasabinawlan nu Ingcumin sa, 121 ku tademaw, pakalatu 94%. u zuma sa, cay ku Yingcumin, 8 ku tademaw, pakalatu 6%. u asip nu cidekay a tademaw u kasabinacadan, Yuwatan(Bunun) 92%, Pangcha(Amis) 2%. u Sakizaya a tademaw inayi' ku Sakizaya a tademaw mueneng itini mueneng, hakay izaw tu, caay henay misumad ku cidekay a ngangan nu Sakizaya. u cidekay nu Taywan Yincumin u siwkay nu Yincumin u niyazu' sa, u luyaluy nu tademaw, pulung muengeneng, u kabana' kami, hina u lalumaay amin i niyazu', caay kayadah ku ihekalay a tademaw. silecaday a lalangawan, lisin, kamu, atu kabanaan. si kalilidan(Tumuk) saca babalaki mililid tu niyazu'. i Taywan Yincumin, izaw ku 16 cidekay puluung sa 748 a niyazu', maka 55 a mang a tademaw. satabakiaya a cidekay ku Pangcah(Amis), saadidi'ay a cidekay ku Laaluwa. u tabakiaya a niyazu' sa, ku Tapalong, u niyazu' nu Pangcah(Amis). i Taywan Yincumin, izaw ku 16 cidekay puluung sa 748 a niyazu', maka 55 a mang a tademaw. satabakiaya a cidekay ku Pangcah(Amis), saadidi'ay a cidekay ku Laaluwa. u tabakiayay a niyazu' sa, ku Tapalong, u niyazu' nu Pangcah(Amis). situlu ku kakuniza nu Yincumincu, sakacacay ku ibukelalay, sakatusa ku ibuyuay, sakatulu sa ku tangabulanay . tademaw nu Yincumin, pulung sausi katukuh 2017 a mihcan 11 a bulad tademaw nu Yincumin, pulung sausi katukuh 2018 a mihcan 3 a bulad pulung sausi (560,820), Pangcah (209,203), Tayan (89,958), Paywan (100,591), Yuwatan (58,336), Rukay (13,303), Puyuma (14,118), Cou (6,635), Saysiat (6,601), Yami (4,599), Saw (780), Kabalan (1,466), Taluku (31,446), Sakizaya (930), Sejek (9,975), Laaluwa (398), Kanakanabu (330), zuma (12,320) tademaw nu Yincumin, pulung sausi katukuh 2018 a mihcan 4 a bulad pulung sausi (561,327), Pangcah (209,430), Tayan (90,059), Paywan (100,689), Yuwatan (58,390), Rukay (13,314), Puyuma (14,140), Cou (6,635), Saysiat (6,607), Yami (4,606), Saw (785), Kabalan (1,465), Taluku (31,501), Sakizaya (929), Sejek (9,992), Laaluwa (399), Kanakanabu (334), zuma (12,052)

== Valana == o solit no Holam 法蘭娜部落 o siwkay no niyazo' i Nantoo a kowan ko niyazo' no Valana. o kasalomaloma' no Valana sa, 38 ko loma'. komod no kasabinawlan sa, 129 ko tademawan. kasabinawlan no Ingcomin sa, 121 ko tademaw, pakalato 94%. o zoma sa, cay ko Yingcomin, 8 ko tademaw, pakalato 6%. o asip no cidekay a tademaw o kasabinacadan, Yowatan(Bonon) 92%, Pangcha(Amis) 2%. o Sakizaya a tademaw inayi' ko Sakizaya a tademaw moeneng itini moeneng, hakay izaw to, caay henay misomad ko cidekay a ngangan no Sakizaya. o cidekay no Taywan Yincomin o siwkay no Yincomin o niyazo' sa, o loyaloy no tademaw, polong moengeneng, o kabana' kami, hina o lalomaay amin i niyazo', caay kayadah ko ihekalay a tademaw. silecaday a lalangawan, lisin, kamo, ato kabanaan. si kalilidan(Tomok) saca babalaki mililid to niyazo'. i Taywan Yincomin, izaw ko 16 cidekay poloong sa 748 a niyazo', maka 55 a mang a tademaw. satabakiaya a cidekay ko Pangcah(Amis), saadidi'ay a cidekay ko Laalowa. o tabakiaya a niyazo' sa, ko Tapalong, o niyazo' no Pangcah(Amis). i Taywan Yincomin, izaw ko 16 cidekay poloong sa 748 a niyazo', maka 55 a mang a tademaw. satabakiaya a cidekay ko Pangcah(Amis), saadidi'ay a cidekay ko Laalowa. o tabakiayay a niyazo' sa, ko Tapalong, o niyazo' no Pangcah(Amis). sitolo ko kakoniza no Yincominco, sakacacay ko ibokelalay, sakatosa ko iboyoay, sakatolo sa ko tangabolanay . tademaw no Yincomin, polong saosi katokoh 2017 a mihcan 11 a bolad tademaw no Yincomin, polong saosi katokoh 2018 a mihcan 3 a bolad polong saosi (560,820), Pangcah (209,203), Tayan (89,958), Paywan (100,591), Yowatan (58,336), Rokay (13,303), Poyoma (14,118), Coo (6,635), Saysiat (6,601), Yami (4,599), Saw (780), Kabalan (1,466), Taloko (31,446), Sakizaya (930), Sejek (9,975), Laalowa (398), Kanakanabo (330), zoma (12,320) tademaw no Yincomin, polong saosi katokoh 2018 a mihcan 4 a bolad polong saosi (561,327), Pangcah (209,430), Tayan (90,059), Paywan (100,689), Yowatan (58,390), Rokay (13,314), Poyoma (14,140), Coo (6,635), Saysiat (6,607), Yami (4,606), Saw (785), Kabalan (1,465), Taloko (31,501), Sakizaya (929), Sejek (9,992), Laalowa (399), Kanakanabo (334), zoma
